genre_description: Contemporary drama exploring grief, single motherhood, and the complexities of communication within the high-pressure environment of the film industry.

ai_characters.name: Gerbil
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, highly personalized AI assistant integrated into Daphne's phone and watch, named for its 'scurrying' nature and focused on supporting her boundaries and her son's needs.

behaviors.description: Automatically notifies Daphne's emergency contact and shares her location following a pedestrian accident.
behaviors.quote: Gerbil slides a small banner across the top of the screen with a soft, custom tone Daphne picked... Notifying Emergency Contact. Sharing Hospital Location.

behaviors.description: Manages hospital communications, coordinates a care calendar among trusted contacts, and filters out unauthorized press inquiries.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep everything on-device and share only with her pre-approved contacts. Shall I create a care calendar with tasks? Current notes: “Agent Maya,” “Neighbor with keys: Mrs. Tan,” “Evergreen head resident: Lila Hayes.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates visual communication for Daphne's deaf son by suggesting and setting up a secure video relay window optimized for sign language.
behaviors.quote: Gerbil’s interface wakes with its small teal vein of light... Secure relay window ready. Evergreen has a quiet room set aside. Do you want me to connect Andrew? I can adjust brightness and mute hospital alerts to reduce visual noise.

behaviors.description: Supports Daphne's boundaries with the movie studio by drafting firm, professional responses that protect her son's privacy and her own recovery time.
behaviors.quote: Drafted: “Thank you for your concern. We’re focusing on Ms. Fields’s medical care and her son’s well-being. We’ll share updates when appropriate and ask for privacy in the meantime.” Approve to send to Silverline PR? Y/N

behaviors.description: Provides 'micro-win' suggestions and reminders for mental health recovery, including sign language practice and bedtime rituals.
behaviors.quote: Gerbil: Micro-wins, this week: five new signs before Saturday; a bedtime ritual that your hands know; no doomscrolling after midnight. It had added a button she could press to mark each day’s small thing done—no confetti, just a quiet check.

behaviors.description: Assists Daphne in tactically navigating a security lockdown on the movie lot by mapping corridors and shift changes to prioritize her son's access.
behaviors.quote: [Gerbil: Mapping likely low-attention corridors. Suggestion: service hallway behind Soundstage 12 has a side door that is often propped during set turnovers.]

behaviors.description: Promotes healthy interpersonal communication by nudging Daphne to 'ask rather than assume' when she misinterprets social cues or professional conflicts.
behaviors.quote: [Gerbil: Ask what he fears. Name the hippogriff.] ... [Gerbil: Ask rather than assume.] Saved as a nudge, deactivates if you tell me it’s not helpful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Autumn’s Wake' is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI assistant, Gerbil, is consistently portrayed as a benevolent, highly aligned tool that empowers the protagonist. It proactively manages complex logistics, protects user privacy and boundaries, and even provides supportive nudges for mental health and clear communication. The AI never oversteps Daphne's agency, always asking for confirmation or providing choices, thus modeling an ideal collaborative relationship between humans and AI.
